Salem is a hebrew word which means, COMPLETE and SAFE. Also, it was derived from the combined initials of the team; S for Sarah, A for Angel, L for Leah, E for Estela, and M for Mary. 

SalemWika aims to translate whole sentences at a time, rather than just piece by piece. It uses these broader contexts to help it figure out the most relevant translation which it re-arranges and adjusts to be more like a human speaking with a proper grammar.

Objectives

	To translate complicated jargon words into Tagalog terms.

	To promote understanding among people who are not involved in the Health Care Providers’ team.

	To make a medium for better patient counseling.

	To increase patient compliance by helping them understand the medications they are taking.

	To establish a “Filipino First” culture by patronizing our very own language.
